definitions: To be at the highest point of something.
To put something on top of something else.
To finish or complete something, often by adding a final touch.
To remove the top part of something.
examples: She will top the list of candidates.
He likes to top his ice cream with sprinkles.
The new movie is expected to top all previous records.
They decided to top off the meal with coffee.
The gardener will top the hedges.
